TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {215326=Zylog Systems is in the Computers - Software Medium & Small sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 28.32 crore. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532883 and the NSE with an NSE Code of ZYLOG.
